instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2936: What is 820-2936? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
threads.message:
the board was liquid damage. i fixed backlight area..
someone has work on this board before.

things seem to be working but fan runs high, can run osx etc...

do i have a bad smc?


ASD give me:

Sensor = Temp (TC0D) -- CPU 0 Die analog (test1) - sensor reads within Operateing range...
check to ensure that sensor....
[COLOR=#FF0000]ERROR - SMC IO FAILED
Test Failed[/COLOR]

Sensor = Temp (TC0P) -- CPU Proximity (test1) - sensor reads within Operateing range...
check to ensure that sensor....
[COLOR=#FF0000]ERROR - SMC IO FAILED
Test Failed[/COLOR]

Sensor = Temp (TM0P) -- Battery Charger Proximity (test1) - sensor reads within Operateing range...
check to ensure that sensor....
[COLOR=#FF0000]ERROR - SMC IO FAILED
Test Failed[/COLOR]

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
threads.message:
checking sensors on page 51 now...

<CHIP>U5510</CHIP> looks good and all the surrounding resistors.

<CHIP>U5510</CHIP>
<SIGNAL>PP3V3_S0_CPUTHMSNS_R</SIGNAL> - pin 1 = 3.249v
<SIGNAL>SMBUS_SMC_B_S0_SDA</SIGNAL> - pin9 = 3.292v
<SIGNAL>SMBUS_SMC_B_S0_SCL</SIGNAL> - pin10 = 3.292v

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
threads.message:
found corrosion on <CHIP>U5410</CHIP>

replaced and didnt fix the adove problems.


any idea?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
threads.message:
<TRANSISTOR>Q5520</TRANSISTOR>'s voltages is constantly jumping:
pin1 = 0.959v-1.111v
pin2 = 0.530v-0.653v
pin3 = 0.937v-1.123v

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
threads.message: <RESISTOR>R5260</RESISTOR>/61 ok? Diode mode on <SIGNAL>SMBUS_SMC_B_S0_SDA</SIGNAL> and SCL? Crap under SMC?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
threads.message: Remove <RESISTOR>R5222</RESISTOR>/23 and check diode mode again. If still different the remove <CHIP>U5510</CHIP> and check diode mode again.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
threads.message:
i'll do these tomorrow.

thanks duke. NN.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
threads.message:
removed <RESISTOR>R5222</RESISTOR>/23

<SIGNAL>SMBUS_SMC_B_S0_SDA</SIGNAL> = 0.746
<SIGNAL>SMBUS_SMC_B_S0_SCL</SIGNAL> = 0.537

yep still different.



removed <CHIP>U5510</CHIP>
<SIGNAL>SMBUS_SMC_B_S0_SDA</SIGNAL> = 1.639
<SIGNAL>SMBUS_SMC_B_S0_SCL</SIGNAL> = 0.513


bad smc?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
threads.message:
reflow smc didnt work.

all smc are gone from my donor boards :(

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
threads.message: Ok duke, i'll return to this thread in a week when more donor boards arrive.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2936</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> MBP 13" 2011 - HIGH FAN - ASD: ERROR SMC IO FAILED
threads.message: new donor boards arrived. i've replaced the smc and 100% passed in ASD :)
